thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: SunPower's reports bigger quarterly loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: SunPower's reports bigger quarterly loss
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - SunPower Corp reported a bigger quarterly loss on Wednesday, largely due to a $624 million non-cash charge related to its residential leases.
The companyâ€™s net loss attributable to shareholders widened to $568.68 million, or $4.07 per share, in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31, from $275.12 million, or $1.99 per share, a year earlier.
The company, majority owned by French energy giant Total SA , said revenue fell 35.8 percent to $658.1 million. (Reporting by Taenaz Shakir in Bengaluru)
